title: Villa boss Gerrard to miss games with Covid-19
description: Aston Villa boss Steven Gerrard will miss Sunday's Boxing Day game at home to Chelsea and Tuesday's trip to Leeds after a positive Covid-19 test.

title: In pictures: Christmas celebrations around the world
description: For the second year running, fewer people are attending festive events because of the Covid outbreak.

title: Obituary: Ray Illingworth, former England captain, coach and administrator
description: Ray Illingworth was one of the leading figures in English cricket for four decades as player, captain, commentator, administrator and coach.

title: Ray Illingworth - Yorkshire and England great dies
description: Former England captain Ray Illingworth has died at the age of 89, Yorkshire have announced.

title: Kate surprises concert audience with piano performance
description: The duchess appears with musician Tom Walker at the event for people who helped in the pandemic.

title: Pope Francis Urbi et Orbi address: World ignoring huge tragedies
description: In his Christmas Day speech, the Pope said "immense tragedies" were being passed over in near silence.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury calls for compassion for Channel migrants
description: In his Christmas sermon, Justin Welby praises rescuers of those trying to reach the UK.

title: Boland debut 'huge' for Australia - Cummins
description: Scot Boland will become only the second player with indigenous Australian heritage to play for the men's Test team in the third Test against England.

title: Ashes: Ex-England batter Michael Carberry's Christmas with Australia coach Justin Langer
description: Former England opener Michael Carberry describes his Christmas at Justin Langer's house and explains what the Australia coach is like.

title: Man charged over theft of copper pine cone bollards in Glasgow
description: Two of the public artworks were reported stolen in the Gorbals area of Glasgow earlier this month.

title: Met Office confirms white Christmas as snow falls in Scotland
description: Snow fell overnight in Aberdeenshire, Shetland, Perthshire and the Scottish Borders.

title: Ashes: England-Australia Melbourne Test - tourists make four changes
description: Zak Crawley and Jonny Bairstow are among four changes made by England for the must-win third Test against Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.

title: Covid: Volunteers ensure Christmas Day booster jabs push
description: Vaccinations continue over the festive period after UK Covid cases hit a record on Christmas Eve.

title: White Christmas: When Wales woke to a month's worth of snow
description: On 7 January, 1982, snow fell non-stop for 36 hours creating 6m high snow drifts.

title: Remembering 1981's white Christmas - that stayed until February
description: The BBC's Neil Prior was three at the time and the snow is one of his formative memories.

title: Covid: Aberystwyth grandmother faces Christmas Day on her own
description: Isolating alone, and five turkey dinner deliveries - this is Covid Christmas 2021.

title: Covid: Holiday plans disrupted as Omicron surge grounds flights
description: Airlines say they are experiencing Covid-related staffing shortages over the busy Christmas period.

title: Robert Carlyle: Begbie has followed me my whole life
description: He is one of Scotland's most successful and versatile actors yet one role has defined his career.

title: Capt Sir Tom Moore's daughter: 'Don't go through grief alone'
description: Capt Sir Tom Moore's daughter urges anyone grieving a loved one at Christmas to reach out for help.

title: Daniel Sturridge: Former Liverpool striker ordered to pay £22k over lost dog
description: Ex-Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge must pay a reward to the man who found his dog, a court says.

title: Kate surprises audience with piano performance
description: Kate appeared alongside the musician Tom Walker in a clip shown at the Westminster Abbey event.

title: Irish citizenship: Covid backlog leads to 'heartbreaking' delays
description: More than 30,000 people face a two-year wait on applications - affecting plans to live and work abroad.

title: Jackie Weaver: Viral star enjoying her celebrity 'adventure'
description: From council meetings to Celebrity Mastermind, Jackie Weaver reflects on being thrust into the limelight.

title: Why I travel back in time for Christmas
description: Nostalgia-lovers are marking Christmas in the style of times past for very different reasons.

title: Parosmia from Covid: Coping with distorted smell and taste at Christmas
description: Sufferers of parosmia - a long Covid side-effect that ravages taste and smell - gear up for Christmas.

title: No time for war: Russians see no chance of conflict
description: With rhetoric becoming harsh and fears of an invasion growing, Muscovites give their views on the crisis.

title: Climate change: Lapland reindeer gone astray in search for food
description: Herders are struggling to find thousands of reindeer that have run away in search of food.

title: Choir creates multi-sensory Christmas carol
description: The group say they produced the carol to make it accessible to everyone.

title: Art: 'People amazed I fold paper for a living, then they see it'
description: Artist Polly Verity loves the look and feel of paper and has been "lost in its landscape" for years.

title: Tractor parade: More than 300 get Christmas glow up for charity
description: The 342-tractor parade takes a rural village tour in Leicestershire raising funds for two charities.
